amendment.description: Amendment eliminates subsection C of Section 2111, which allows grant money to bypass states and go directly from the Department of Education to local districts.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bishop (UT) amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Bishop (UT) amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A014) offered by Mr. Bishop (UT).
